name: AddABC
signature: AddABC(*, a: int, b: int, c: int)
docstring:
This model takes 3 parameters - a, b, and c and adds them together in two steps.

Parameters
----------
a : int
    This is parameter a.
b : int
    This is parameter b.
c : int
    This is parameter c.

Intermediates
-------------
ab : int
    This holds a + b.

Returns
-------
abc : int
    The sum of ab and c.

Steps
-----
1) _add_a_b - Add a and b together and assign to ab.
2) _add_ab_c - Add ab and c together for final return.

_add_a_b.name: _add_a_b
_add_a_b.docstring: Add a and b together and assign to ab.

_add_ab_c.name: _add_ab_c
_add_ab_c.docstring: Add ab and c together for final return.
